full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Maintenance Support for Treasury Board Secretariat

## Solicitation Overview

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) seeks a contractor to provide maintenance and support services for Erwin Data Modeler software for the Treasury Board Secretariat. This solicitation details amendments 1, 2, and 3 to the original contract.

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Reference Number:** SSC-24-00025201:T
* **Publications Date:** January 25, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** February 13, 2024 at 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** Not Applicable
* **Solicitation Status:** Expired
* **GSIN Category:** *COMPUTER SOFTWARE, OFFICE AUTOMATION
* **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region and Location:** Canada, National Capital Region
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **End User Entity:** Treasury Board Secretariat

## Bidder and Contractor Information

* **Bidder and Contractor must register in the SSC P2P Portal** to view and access solicitations, submit a response to a solicitation, receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations, be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments, and submit invoices and receive payment status updates.
* **Registration URL:** [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)
* **Contact Information:**

 | **Information Type** | **Language** |
 | --- | --- |
 | **Name** | Clara Whittaker |
 | **Email** | - |

 | **Fax** | 343-553-8354 |
